tool.name: QC Coverage Metrics
tool.description: Create QC metrics from GATK DepthOfCoverage per locus output.

param.name: depth
param.label: Depth cutoffs
param.help: Coverage metrics will be based off of these values, separated by spaces.

param.name: transcripts
param.label: RefSeq Transcript List
param.help: Input a list of RefSeq transcripts.

tool.help: Calculates Q30% and percentages of depths above a certain threshold on both the genomic interval and gene levels. Outputs are gene and probe tsv's to be imported in to CGD.
